name: Token Page NFT Gallery
tagline: Customisable & Branded Gallery for your NFTsüåÜ
description: Web3 is broken. Opensea owns the relationship with your community. We're here to change that! Our customized gallery gives you the hub you need to build amazing experiences with & for your community.

sections.titleText: A branded, customizable, **ENGAGEMENT HUB** for your Community üåÜ
sections.subtitleText:
Web3 communities are broken. Marketplaces (ahem, Opensea) defines the relationship you have with your community. We're here to change that! 

 Our customized hub gives you the tools you need to build amazing experiences for & with your community.

sections.titleText: What does it mean for your community?
sections.bodyText:
Our Gallery let's you own your experience with your community. There's a reason huge projects like [Azuki](https://www.azuki.com/gallery) and [Cool Cats](https://www.coolcatsnft.com/gallery) are doing this, and we get it üí≠.

When you own your experience with your community, not only does your brand value grow, but your community becomes stronger üí™.

With our galleries you can add customized features that suit your community specifically, like adding lore around your creations, allowing your members to customise them and so much more!

Our Gallery starts off basic; it's simply a place for you to show off your best work - your NFTs.

On top of this, you can layer on richer and more engaging experiences. Meme-submission contests with voting, renaming and adding lore to characters, follow-trains, let your imagination run wild ‚ö°‚ö°Ô∏è
For the [GoblinTown Gallery](https://goblintown.tokenpage.xyz) we built a fully brand-customized gallery. Every interaction feels like your are experiencing it as the founders intended üöÄ.

For the [Sprite Club Gallery](https://goblintown.tokenpage.xyz) we went a step further and built out a feature to show off which sprites have or have not claimed a certain airdrop.

Instead of having to build an entire new app for this, the experience is native to the community hub üôå.
Your communities are incredibly creative. Let's put that creativity to good use and allow them to change the name of their NFT, add lore to it, show off their favourite meme and more!
Allow your members to verify their twitter and we can tell you which of them talk about your project the most and even which have the most influence!
Your communities have a presence in many other communities. We can show you where the biggest overlaps are so you know where to work on collaborations, giveaways and more!
Your communities are incredibly creative. Let's put that creativity to good use and allow them to change the name of their NFT, add lore to it, show off their favourite meme and more!
If you're project has staking or other features based on things like time held, we can show your members their status and even incorporate the staking controls into you Gallery.
We're ready to build galleries for all ethereum NFT projects. Get in touch and let's get started - we can have yours up in a matter of days.

sections.titleText: Or we can reach out to you...

boxes.name: Arthur Fox
boxes.bodyText: Crypto-native! Previously in Games, VR, FinTech and startups! All-in on crypto since 2016.

boxes.name: Krishan Patel
boxes.bodyText: Full-Stack Engineer. Previously web2 VC-backed Co-Founder and CTO with successful exit.
